ActCanada Transportation Act
PrecisApproval of the Regulations Amending the CARRIERS AND TRANSPORTATION AND GRAIN HANDLING UNDERTAKINGS INFORMATION REGULATIONS (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) that were made by the Minister of Transport on May 29, 2007, and provide for the repeal of section 10.2 and revise the wording of section 17 respecting the submission, if required, of information relating to the economic conditions of motors carriers.
